verbose_text: The tissues were then treated with blocking solution (Block ace; DS Pharma Biomedical Co., Ltd) for 1 h at 4degreesC, incubated with anti-mouse B220 antibody conjugated with biotin (RA-6B2) in solution A overnight at 4degreesC, and washed.
evidence: blocking solution (Block ace; DS Pharma Biomedical Co., Ltd) for 1 h at 4degreesC, incubated with anti-mouse B220 antibody
